price: 46.Nummah A-Qhuraanih addal baxxaqqa itta Aayootay cakki baxxaqqa hayta oobisne, Yalli isi naqoosak isih faxa mara massa-le gitâ (islaamaninanâ di i ni kinnuk) fanah tirri haa.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ ءَايَٰتٖ مُّبَيِّنَٰتٖۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā āyātin mubayyinātin wal-lahu yahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
